title: Delicate Diamond Accent Mangalsutra - Modern Karimani Mala
features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra, this piece features two delicate strands of black onyx beads separated by a CZ diamond studded bead. The necklace culminates in a teardrop-shaped pendant with diamond accents. The rose gold plating gives it a contemporary, chic look. The minimalist design makes it ideal for everyday wear.
description: This Mangalsutra is perfect for the modern woman who wants to honor tradition with a touch of contemporary style. The piece is crafted with high-quality materials to ensure durability and lasting shine. The sleek design makes it versatile enough to be worn with both traditional and western attire. Offers excellent value with its fine detailing and premium materials.
